strings:
<se_def>*: State your business!
You're approaching the Dark Ruins!
Do you not realise how dangerous it is here!?
<se_def>*: You're either very brave or very stupid if you do! Just coming this far's enough to chill a hero's heart!

<se_def>*: Wait a minute...
You're not Dhoulmagus's minions, are you!?
<se_def>*: Hey! Hold on! You can't go waving your sword at people and asking things like that!
<se_def>*: Anyway, judging from how he killed the boss, I'd say this Dhoulmagus is working alone.
<se_def>*: And even if these chaps here are his ‘minions’, they're hardly likely to admit to it, are they!?
<se_high>*: He's right. Let's just calm down a bit.
<se_high>*: If they worked for him, I doubt they'd be as brazen as to stroll up here like this.<page>*: No, they'd join him in the ruins via a sinister underground cave...or something...

<se_def>*: Hmm, yes... I suppose you're right.
I'd better put my sword away then.
